explains: v. 无意中听到，偷听到

sentences.en: They were shut away in a little room where nobody could overhear.
sentences.cn: 他们躲在一个小屋子里，没有人能偷听得到。

sentences.en: Perhaps the neighbours just happened to "overhear" the cry.
sentences.cn: 也许邻居们只是碰巧“听到”了那声喊叫。

sentences.en: I happened to overhear what he said.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧听到了他所说的话。
